entry.title: Love
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bouquet Bar
Type: Box
Price: 51.99

Delicate red spray roses are a timeless expression of love. Tell that special someone how you feel any time of year with a bouquet of small roses. Sweeten the deal with our melt-in-your-mouth caramels drenched in organic chocolate sourced from fine European beans. We've sprinkled them with high-quality sea salt for the perfect savory complement. The Box measures approximately 8" x 4" x 3".

  • Red Spray Roses
  • Dark Chocolate Covered Sea Salt Caramels

entry.title: Mi Amore
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bouquet Bar
Type: Box
Price: 54.99

You just can't go wrong with the classics. From Valentine's Day or your anniversary or just because, red spray roses are the perfect way to let someone know how special they are. And our chocolate truffles, made from fine organic European chocolate, are downright sexy. Indulge her senses with this tastefully romantic gift box. The Box measures approximately 8" x 4" x 3".

  • Red Spray Roses
  • Chocolate Truffles

entry.title: Be Mine
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bouquet Bar
Type: Box
Price: 171.99

If you want to make her day, give her a spa experience at home. Our full-size roses create just the right ambiance for a little "me" time. Our sugar scrub provides spa-level exfoliation to reveal fresh, radiant skin. We've included our bath bomb with its soft floral scent and skin-pampering properties. The Box measures approximately 24" x 17" x 7".

Vendor: Bouquet Bar
Type: Box
Price: 64.99

Maybe the way to her heart is through her senses. Tempt her taste buds with soft yet chewy gummy hearts. Treat her eyes to the desert beauty of our succulent plant. Red spray roses do double duty with their timeless appeal and lovely fragrance. She won't forget this gift box anytime soon. The Box measures approximately 12" x 4" x 3".

entry.title: Sweet Serenity
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bouquet Bar
Type: Box
Price: 97.99

Send a gift of comfort. White spray roses, organic herbal tea and our lavender candle encourage relaxation and a good night's sleep. Our lavender chocolates combine soul-soothing chocolate and anxiety-alleviating herbal goodness. Almonds offer stress-reducing crunch, mood-boosting tryptophan and vitamin E to combat the physical effects of stress. Our gummy hearts are the sweetest finishing touch. The Box measures approximately 12" x 8" x 3".

  • White Spray Roses
  • Organic Teas
  • Lavender Dark Chocolate Drops
  • Lavender Fields Candle 
  • Sugar Coated Sour Gummy Hearts
  • Suprime Roasted & Salted Almonds
